Package zuul.pkg_game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • zuul.pkg_game.Player
  • public class Player
extends Object
    This class is intended to manage the player state through the game.
    Version:
    06.04.21
    Author:
    Corentin POUPRY

    • Method Detail

      • toPreviousRoom

        public Room toPreviousRoom()
                    throws EmptyStackException,
                           Timer.TimerLimitException
        Goes back to the previous room.
        Returns:
        The previous room.
        Throws:
        EmptyStackException - If there is no previous room.
        Timer.TimerLimitException - If the timer has expired.

      • clearRoomHistory

        public void clearRoomHistory()
        Clears the room history.

      • goToExit

        public void goToExit​(String pDirection)
              throws Room.CannotAccessRoomException,
                     Timer.TimerLimitException
        Takes an exit and move the player to the new room.
        Parameters:
        pDirection - Exit to be taken.
        Throws:
        Room.CannotAccessRoomException - If no room is found for the direction given.
        Timer.TimerLimitException - If the player cannot makes any movement because of the timer.

      • takeItem

        public Item takeItem​(String pItemName)
              throws Item.CannotManageItemException
        Takes an item in the current room.
        Parameters:
        pItemName - The item to be taken.
        Returns:
        The item that has been taken.
        Throws:
        Item.CannotManageItemException - If the requested object cannot be took.

      • dropItem

        public Item dropItem​(String pItemName)
              throws Item.CannotManageItemException
        Drops an item in the current room.
        Parameters:
        pItemName - The item to be dropped.
        Returns:
        The item that has been dropped.
        Throws:
        Item.CannotManageItemException - If the item is not found in the inventory.
